constructor.param: A bool value specifying if the object will be low LOD. A low LOD object has no collision and a longer draw distance.

move.param: The rotation relative to the current rotation
The easing function to use for the interpolation (default is "Linear")
The period of the easing function (only some easing functions use this parameter)
The amplitude of the easing function (only some easing functions use this parameter)
The overshoot of the easing function (only some easing functions use this parameter)
move.returns: True if the object moved succesfully, false otherwise

getfromname.returns: Returns a player class instance if succesful
getfromname.exception: Thrown when no player with this name can be found
